name: Styleguide
body:
# It's dangerous to go alone. Take this!
> Welcome to the internal GitHub styleguide. This is where you should look if you're interested in how to write code for GitHub. We have a living **CSS styleguide**, **JavaScript styleguide** and some recommendations on how to write **[Ruby code](/styleguide/ruby)**.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
